entry.title: Blacksmith V4 C3
entry.content:
It was the day of the Autumn Sports Festival.

On that day the students had a chance to show the results of their day-to-day training. Some people were not enthusiastic about it, while others just loves it.

entry.title: Blacksmith V4 C2
entry.content:
"I see flowers."
"She's looking at flowers."
Two stalkers looking at a pretty girl who was looking at flowers.
No, the prince was the one real stalker, I was just his guard.

entry.title: Chapter 14 The Return Of The Hero
entry.content:
Xie Junyan has a girm face, he stands in the corridor without saying a word.

He sends a message to Li Lei: "At noon, after school, come and see me!"

Even Zhuang Meina has nothing to say, and she stares like a dead fish at Lingyun who is starting the ninth lap, looking as if she just lost millions.

entry.title: Chapter 13 Deafiting Tiger
entry.content:
Note: We are recruting Editor for our novels. You can Contact Us through Contact Us page. Mail us at novellatranslation@gmail.com

Right now Lingyun is not even 50 meters into the fifth lap, and Li Lei has enough time to stop him.

He believes that if he pushed Lingyun now, he would certainly fall to the ground and not come back up.

entry.title: Blacksmith V4 C1
entry.content:
That day I had a lesson in the afternoon. A man swiftly opened the window of my room from the outside, as I was trying to start with my daily manual labours.

"Prince!?"
As I turned around and tried to catch up with what was going on, I looked clearly puzzled. I didn't care.
In that moment I also realized that my room was exposed to enemy invasions at any time.

entry.title: Chapter 12 A True Man!
entry.content:
“The fourth lap!”, somebody exclaimed.

Suddenly the playground fell to silence. After a few seconds and even louder cheering burst out, mixed with a round of applause.

“The fourth lap? Ah, that's quite slow...” Lingyun spouted with a hint of self-deprecation, while he was smiling and biting his tongue.

entry.title: Chapter 1 To A New World
entry.content:
It's Light Novel version of "Shinka No Mi", So if you have any other Japanese novel For suggestion Please comment below.i will try to translate. Thank you

This is my name. I am a second grade student going to a special high school.

Even if it is special, it is not a place where people have cartoon-like abilities, or frequented by aliens.

It is rather a so-called idol training school...

entry.title: Chapter 11 Change Of Perception
entry.content:
Note: We need editors for our novels. Anyone intrested please contact us @ Novellatranslation@gmail.com

Happy Valentine's Day

"How heavy is that bag?"

Tang Meng made his way to Cheng Zhi, where those three sports students were. He pulled out a box of Soviet cigarettes, picked one out of the box and threw it in his general direction.

entry.title: Chapter 10 - Gambling
entry.content:
Note: We have tried to translate this chapter. If you like our translation. We will pick up the novel. This is not edited.

Tang Meng seems to have long been expected to Xie Junyan certainly, so he smiled, thumbs pointing to the direction of the playground, in a leisurely way: "Since Xie little interest, you should quickly bet…” “Well, but the fat man has already run a half - circle, can you bet how much he can run?”

All of the students want to bet and are breathtakingly staring at Xie Junyan. Obviously, we are more convinced of his judgment.

entry.title: Chapter 2 - You Dare To take Off Ah
entry.content:
They were in the presidential room now.

A charming man with perfect figure sat down on the sofa. Su Jian An couldn't stop staring into his sexy lips.

"I don't have any feelings for you. Marrying you is to fulfill my mom's wish. You and I won't be the real husband and wife. Understand?"

Su Jian An just blinked her eyes and said: "Um, yeah, this is a coincidence. I also don't have any feelings for you. Brother Bao Yam, can we shake a hand?"

entry.title: Chapter 1 - A Warm Wedding and A New Bride of Young Master Lu
entry.content:
Su Jian An came out from the toilet after washed her hands. A pair of man and woman were caught off guard by her.

It was the popular Han Ruo Xi and the president of Lu's family, Lu Bao Yan!

She quickly ran and hide behind the wall and was peeking at them.

"I heard that she was just a forensic. How could you be her man?"

Han Ruo Xi watched Lu Bao Yan's face looked calm. She felt that she was betrayed by him.

entry.title: Chapter 2 Vitality
entry.content:
The story of the way of Yan was pretty mysterious, thousand years ago there were Buddhists living in those immortal world. But the Buddhists and the people were having a big war against each other which shook the ground. After that, the Buddhist were just disappeared and hundreds of years had passed and the way of Yan existed.

The training style of Yan and the Buddhist were having a lot of similarities and also the Yan people were looking down to the Buddhist. They were always having war, so Mei-Luo would not want her son to join the Yan path.

entry.title: Chapter 1 You Ran Mi Lets Have A Fight
entry.content:
"You Ran-Mi! Let's have a fight!"

There's a woman, the most charming woman, a young woman with a gentle and weak appearance, confronting a man with a strong-build body.

"I'm begging you, stop hitting me, miss Luo, sister...... I understand it, please stop, I'm begging you......"

You Ran-Mi scampered off like a frightened rat, the young woman keeps swinging her long sleeves, crackling sounds to be heard, hitting You Ran-Mi until he begs for a mercy, at the moment, a loud eerie screaming of waaa waaa, suddenly the young woman started to dread.
